PModel

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • PModel.Manageable
      • PModel.Activity

  • public class Activity
extends Manageable
    Activities derive from Manageable Class, and are identified by a Project ID, as well as an activity number.
    Author:
    Alex Huot
